name: Angler Slime
description: Inhabit the deepest depths of the Slime Sea.

name: Batty Slime
description: Love to lurk cold, dark places, like caves.

name: Boom Slime
description: Often heard before they're seen.

name: Cotton Slime
description: Always looking for an excuse to leap high into the air.

name: Crystal Slime
description: Covered in a crown of shimmering, crystal spikes.

name: Dervish Slime
description: A swirling, whirling bundle of energy in slimy form.

name: Fire Slime
description: A rare breed of slime that lives on ash.

name: Flutter Slime
description: Will only eat the sweet but fleeting moondew nectar.

name: Gold Slime
description: The most exclusive and sought after of all slime species.

name: Honey Slime
description: An odd breed of slime composed of a hyper-sweet slime compound.

name: Hunter Slime
description: The wild cousin of the tabby slime.

name: Lucky Slime
description: Gobbles up any coin it can find.

name: Phosphor Slime
description: Comes out at night, flying about the moonlit range .

name: Pink Slime
description: The most common slime found in the Far, Far Range.

name: Puddle Slime
description: A rare species of slime that live in fresh water pools .

name: Ringtail Slime
description: Nothing but trouble.

name: Rock Slime
description: Earned their name from their rocky crown of sharp spikes.

name: Saber Slime
description: Believed to be one of the fiercest predators during the Jellassic Period.

name: Tabby Slime
description: Share many curious similarities to domesticated house cats of Earth.

name: Tangle Slime
description: A fearsome predator with a big appetite for tasty meat.

name: Tarr Slime
description: The tarr seek only to consume and replicate.

name: Yolky Slime
description: Within their warm, golden center lies an enduring love for chickens.
